entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 50 gusting to 70 then southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
